channel.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
channel.description:
Hey Mopar, wouldn't an arcade be nice for the forum. :)
We can develop our scar techniques by cheating on the games and getting more experience in the whole scripting thing.
The SMF Mod is here. http://mods.simplemachines.org/index.php?mod=36
Hope you consider it. :D

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote author=1337h4x link=topic=18278.msg242169#msg242169 date=1158286600]

[quote=“the one, post:6, topic:12325”]Have anti-macro for the non-macroing games?Lawl,I’m starting to sound like jagex.
How do you program anti-macro anyway?[/quote]

[code] public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) { if(!hasFocus()) System.out.println("you macroed"); }[/code] record stuff like mouseEnter and mouseExit in booleans and shit.

Then use the robot class to get the location of the REAL mouse and compare it to the x and y of the click.


Soo…what’s that helping with? Or am I just missing a point?

Read full topic

How do you program anti-macro anyway?[/quote]

[quote]

public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) { if(!hasFocus()) System.out.println("you macroed"); }
record stuff like mouseEnter and mouseExit in booleans and shit.

Then use the robot class to get the location of the REAL mouse and compare it to the x and y of the click.

Read full topic

[quote=“Ron, post:26, topic:12325”]Yeah mopar I never understood that. Why did you separate the forums? To steer away from some bandwidth problems?

And it’s only 1 day’s work. What’s that like… 1 day you will miss out on and you will live for about 23725 more or so days. :)[/quote]

I seperated the forums to move the spam away from this one.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:24, topic:12325”]Oh that’s a shame. Maybe in your spare time download the new version of SMF, apply all the hacks/mods you want that have been made by other people, and then when you’re completely atisfied, apply your own mods/tweaks and upload it.

I noticed that there was a new version of SMF, so I figured it might be worth a shot. :)[/quote]

There is, but thats a lot of work, not only do I have to reapply all of the mods I did myself:

  1. no postcount
  2. scar tags
  3. no negative rep
  4. the biggest of all: seperating the two forums, its very painful.

but I also have to uninstall and later reinstall (+ make old mods compatible with rc3) every single mod I have on the forums, that is including no double posts, awards, and the karma description mod.

That is like an entire days work, so maybe Ill get around to it one day, hopefully soon

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Oh that’s a shame. Maybe in your spare time download the new version of SMF, apply all the hacks/mods you want that have been made by other people, and then when you’re completely atisfied, apply your own mods/tweaks and upload it.

I noticed that there was a new version of SMF, so I figured it might be worth a shot.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

Swift, go away, you just say “NO ARCADE” and you do not say why…moparisthebest.org would really welcome you…

Actually, if you are superstisious,(sp?), look at this case:
Case study,Subject:Rs-server.net.
Which part:Arcade.
Argument:Rs-server.net had an arcade, and look how they turned out?

Not that I have anything against arcades, but having it just for scar cheating is just…wrong…

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

Mr chris, you seem very opiniated on this, you seem very educated

Well, I am not personally against arcades, but I want to point out some things, Ron.
1)We could have awards for legitametly playing, as Mr Chris has pointed out, as winning using scar would go under a scar cup

2)We could have another cup for those who have bothered to program the games, taking a load off mopar, or if they are included already, have another cup for those who have improved the games.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Dw mate, I’m not getting in to a huff about it, I’m just expressing my…erm…opinion on the matter.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Ehh its just something fun to add Chris. Nothing to fuss over. It’s not just for RS cheating, a lot of people come here for other things. And even a good percentage just comes here because this is a better community than most. This is just an idea, it’s not like it will be implemented.

Mopar hasn’t even posted, and I’m sure he’s seen this topic. So chill.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Well, if there is an arcade on this forum, people would browse while playing. I also don’t agree with “people should get rewards for doing well in a game.” That surely should be a SCAR cup because you wrote a SCAR script that beat the game. We already have rewards for coding. Simple beating a game isn’t a well deserved reward.

A point system would bring a negative effect to the forums. There would be no point to it, other than showing how many times you beat a game. Which you could get an infinite number of times if you could just macro through the game.

There are plenty of other ways to ‘beat’ people on this forum. Gfx battles, SOTW contests, releasing a bettr SCAR script than the current. There are many ways. This forum isn’t being better than someone else though. It’s all about cheating on RuneScape.

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Mr. Chris, no one would browse a forum while playing a game lol. The whole point of an arcade for this forum is so we could…

  • Get awards for the games we beat/macroed on
  • Maybe later have a point system included with it.
  • The overall fun of beating someone else (macroing).

Read full topic

item.title: [Req] SMF Forum ARCADE! :)
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Personally, I have never had much interest for online arcades. They have never really appealed to me. I would never play a game while browsing this forum because it diverts my main focus to a game and therefore taking a majority away from helping other people in the Gfx section and whereever else.

All i’m saying is that the arcade doesn’t appeal to me. There are plenty of other online games that are easyily SCARable. I don’t think introducing an arcade would improve the ammount of experienced SCAR writers. Maybe, we should be telling more people to script for simple games instead of introducing an arcade to the forums.

There’s my opinion but it is up to what the majority wants

Read full topic
